mutants.code:
def can_meet_network_needs(t, n, a, b):
    results = []
    for test_case in range(t):
        num_cities = n[test_case]
        needs = a[test_case]
        capacities = b[test_case]
        if sum(capacities) <= sum(needs):
            results.append('NO')
            continue
        (lo, hi) = (0, capacities[-1])
        flag = True
        (xmax, cur, x) = (capacities[-1], 0, capacities[-1])
        for i in range(num_cities - 1):
            cur = cur + capacities[i] - needs[i]
            if cur < 0:
                xmax += cur
                x += cur
                cur = 0
            cur = min(cur, capacities[i])
            xmax = min(xmax, capacities[i] - cur)
            if xmax < 0:
                flag = False
                break
        if flag and x + cur >= needs[-1]:
            results.append('YES')
        else:
            results.append('NO')
    return results

        if flag and x + cur >= needs[-1]:
            results.append('YES')

    return results
